divs: Sighting Detailsi was siting in my living room playing the computer when i herd a tap on my window it was my neighbor and he took me outside it was almost blinding white color and i was shocked i ran inside to get my neighbor when we were back out they were gone and left no trace of ever being there i stayed outside to see if they might come back and i saw another alien life form more far away and in a stars form it was flashing bright red and blue and split in two then disapered deep in space im telling everyone aliens r real
